2.1.1.name: wordpress/moolah-e-commerce
2.1.1.description:
The Moolah E-Commerce plugin for WordPress will load a Moolah Store into your WordPress Website. The plugin loads your store into the page or post of your choice, from which customers can select a product a product and proceed through the checkout. Products can be managed from one central location available in the admin area of your site.

Features:

  • Single Page Checkout keeps the customer focused on completing the purchase
  • Checkout Steps loaded dynamically using AJAX
  • Mobile friendly Order Interface can be loaded into multiple sites simultaneously
  • Centralized Management Console let's you control everything from one location
